DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective crossover trial compare 3-month , mean 24-hour intraocular pressure ( IOP ) control safety obtain two popular fix combination glaucoma patient insufficiently control latanoprost monotherapy . This study compare 24-hour efficacy travoprost/timolol fix combination without benzalkonium chloride give evening , versus latanoprost/timolol fix combination give even . It assume travoprost/timolol fix combination provide good quality 24-hour pressure control .
